headline: Seagate Note Exchange Raises Questions On Debt Load And Share Dilution
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings (NasdaqGS:STX) has entered privately negotiated exchange agreements covering $600 million of exchangeable notes issued by a subsidiary. The notes will be settled using a mix of cash and Seagate ordinary shares, according to the company. The transactions affect Seagate's capital structure and are intended to address existing exchangeable debt obligations. Seagate Technology Holdings, known for its hard disk drives and data storage solutions, operates in an...
